text: Think about a child, he/she doesn't have comfortable place to live.  He/She needs to worry about their meal everyday.  it is time we should give them a hand.  You only need to donate part of your payment to them and can make the different to them.
I am willing to donate because I have a six-year-old and a baby boy due in 3 months. I agree with you. I am so thankful to God they are blessed with food and clothes and home but not all are.
I know that some child in other countries they are facing the health issue.  So, I believe your donation will help to save their lives.
What kind of health issue are they facing?
They are lack of medicine when they are sick.   They don't have money to see the doctor.
How much would they need to help them?
I would say instead of eating out one night, you can save those money and donate to those children.
Yes those meals do add up fast I realize. I feel guilty knowing how others in other countries are less fortunate.
For me, instead of taking the bus for a short distant, I would take a walk and save those money and raise a child in another country.  I believe you can do it.
What charity that you know of needs help the most in other countries?
Save the children
How long have they been in business helping children out?
This non-profit organization has been established for years.
What services do they provide for children?
they are building them teh school
Will thirty cents of a donation help them build it?
More or less will also help.
I can make it $0.75 to help out this cause.
once again, thank you for your donation.  :-)
Ok. I am going to donate $0.75 to Save The Children.
